question_text:
Question 47 
 
The return period of a large earthquake for a given region is 200 years.  Assuming that earthquake 
occurrence follows Poisson’s distribution, the probability that it will be exceeded at least once in 50 years 
is _________ % 
 
(rounded off to the nearest integer) 
Ans. 21 to 23
